extDescription.message: Intelligent web content summarization using AI. Supports web pages, YouTube videos, and Reddit threads.

extSubtitle.message: Configure your API settings to start summarizing web content

step1Desc.message: Provide the endpoint, model, and credentials needed for the extension to talk to your API.

helpProvider.message: Select a preset to auto-fill the recommended endpoint. OpenAI-compatible presets automatically append /completions.

helpApiUrl.message: The field above is auto-filled from the selected provider preset. OpenAI-style providers automatically append /completions.

helpModel.message: Pick the exact model identifier that should process summaries (e.g., gpt5.2, claude-4.6-sonnet).

helpApiKey.message: Your API key stays in browser storage and is used only to authenticate with the endpoint above.

step2Desc.message: Configure output preferences and summary behavior.

helpSystemPrompt.message: Customize how the AI should summarize content. Leave blank for the built-in instructions.

helpFontSize.message: Set the initial font size for the floating summary window (allowed range: 8-24px).

step3Desc.message: Tell the extension what to collect from YouTube and Reddit before it calls the AI.

descWebPages.message: General settings for summarizing standard web pages.

helpContextMenu.message: Adds a "Summarize selection" option to the browser context menu when text is highlighted.

descYouTube.message: Control transcripts, timestamps, and language hints while summarizing videos.

helpTimestamps.message: Adds HH:MM:SS markers to the prompt. Each timestamp increases tokens and may raise API cost.

helpTimestampPrompt.message: These instructions are appended to the system prompt only when timestamps are enabled.

helpSubtitleType.message: Choose whether to prefer automatic transcripts or human captions. Automatic falls back when unavailable.

helpPreferredLang.message: Provide a single language code (e.g., en, es, fr). Defaults to English if left blank.

descReddit.message: Choose how many threads to read and how they are sorted before summarizing.

helpMaxComments.message: Maximum number of top-level threads to include (1-100).

helpReplyDepth.message: Pick how deep the scraper should traverse replies (0 = top level only).

helpSortComments.message: Current keeps whatever is visible on-page. Other modes fetch sorted threads silently.

step4Desc.message: Inspect what is being captured before it ever leaves the page.

helpDebugMode.message: When enabled, the extracted raw content is shown inside the window instead of sending it to the AI. Perfect for troubleshooting selectors.

infoStep2.message: Navigate to any webpage or YouTube video

infoStep3.message: Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar

infoStep4.message: Wait for the AI to analyze and summarize the content

infoStep5.message: View the summary in the floating window

stepSlash.description: Short label for slash commands section

stepSlashDesc.message: Create slash commands for quick prompts. Type / in the chat to use them.

cardSlashTitle.description: Card title for slash commands list

btnAddCommand.description: Button to add a new slash command

helpSlash.message: Commands must be alphanumeric (no spaces). The '/' prefix is added automatically.

placeholderPrompt.message: Enter the prompt that will be sent when this command is used...

emptySlash.message: No commands yet. Click 'Add Command' to create one.
emptySlash.description: Message shown when no slash commands are configured

errorMaxSlash.description: Error message when limit is reached

emptyDropdown.message: No commands found. Configure in extension options.
emptyDropdown.description: Message shown in dropdown when no commands match

menuQuickCommands.description: Label for the quick commands parent menu item

menuConfigureCommands.description: Label for the configure commands placeholder item

menuSummarizeSelection.description: Label for the summarize selection context menu item
